I am a first-year PhD student in the CRAFT team at the Inria (Université Grenoble Alpes), supervised by Dr. Mélina Skouras, Prof. Arthur Lebée and Prof. Georges-Pierre Bonneau. My research sits at the intersection of geometry processing, simulation and mechanics, with a focus on the computational design of origami-inspired inflatable hulls.

Previously I was a Senior Research Fellow at IIT Delhi with Prof. Rahul Narain, and I hold an MSR from IIIT Hyderabad (advised by Prof. Avinash Sharma at CVIT and Prof. Srinath Sridhar at Brown IVL). I also spent five months as a visiting research fellow at Brown University.

Feel free to contact me via Email / Twitter / Linkedin / Github / GoodReads
